name: Fall on your kneeeeeees!
author: moementum3000
notes: Nothing new. I copied a standard CA deck that was posted. Haven't been Kog since they nerf HHG. I thought I was playing CA correctly but after reading the CA guide I learned  way more combos . Went from L1 to KOG in one day. If anyone is struggling out there read those guides they have, they are full of great stuff.
